note.p: Merchant and apiarian specialist. Established a firm selling apiarian appliances in Holborn, London, in 1814; the firm moved to 149 Regent Street, London, in 1852.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1507/448/33)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 October 2018)
Oxfordshire, England, Church of England baptism, marriages, and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 October 2018
